content: अशरीर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Bodiless, incorporeal. --रः {@--1@} The Supreme Being (परमात्मन्), Brahma. {@--2@} (In Mīmāmsā) A god or deity in general. {@--3@} Cupid, the god of love चेतांसि चिंताभिरिवाशरीरः <ls>Ki. 17. 10</ls>: <ls>Śi. 9. 61.</ls> {@--4@} An ascetic who has renounced all worldly connections; °त्वं --ता absolution.
